statements: SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT field_id, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE date = '2022-05-20';
SELECT MAX(moisture_level) AS max_moisture FROM soil_moisture_levels;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT field_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM soil_moisture_levels GROUP BY field_id;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels ORDER BY field_id DESC, date ASC
SELECT moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE field_id = 5
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT field_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS average_moisture FROM soil_moisture_levels GROUP BY field_id HAVING AVG(moisture_level) > 50
SELECT field_id, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM soil_moisture_levels GROUP BY field_id ORDER BY total_entries DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM field;
SELECT field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field WHERE soil_moisture_level > 3;
SELECT * FROM moisture_reading ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT reading_id, reading_time, reading_value FROM moisture_reading WHERE reading_value < 4 ORDER BY reading_value ASC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM moisture_reading WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT field_id, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading FROM moisture_reading GROUP BY field_id;
SELECT field_id, field_name, soil_moisture_level FROM field ORDER BY soil_moisture_level DESC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, reading_time, reading_value FROM field JOIN moisture_reading ON field.field_id = moisture_reading.field_id WHERE reading_value >= 50;
SELECT * FROM Field;
SELECT field_id, field_name, location FROM Field WHERE soil_type='Clay';
SELECT field_id, MAX(last_moisture_level) AS max_moisture_level FROM Field;
SELECT fh.history_date, f.field_name, fh.notes FROM FieldHistory fh JOIN Field f ON fh.field_id = f.field_id;
SELECT f.field_name, mr.moisture_level FROM Field f JOIN MoistureReading mr ON f.field_id = mr.field_id WHERE mr.moisture_level > 50;
SELECT field_name, location, soil_type FROM Field;
SELECT * FROM MoistureReading WHERE moisture_level > 5 ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT field_name, location FROM Field WHERE soil_type = 'Sandy' AND last_moisture_level < 3;
SELECT field_id, MAX(moisture_level) FROM MoistureReading GROUP BY field_id HAVING MAX(moisture_level) > 10;
SELECT field_id, history_date, action, notes FROM FieldHistory ORDER BY history_date ASC, action DESC;
SELECT * FROM fields ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT field_name, location FROM fields WHERE location = 'Farm';
SELECT field_id, field_name, location FROM fields WHERE field_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT field_name, location FROM fields WHERE field_name LIKE 'Crop_%';
SELECT field_id, location FROM fields WHERE field_name = 'Field A' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM fields;
SELECT field_name, location FROM fields WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, moisture_level, recorded_at FROM fields JOIN moisture_data ON fields.field_id = moisture_data.field_id;

SELECT field_name, location, description FROM fields JOIN field_weather ON fields.field_id = field_weather.field_id JOIN weather_conditions ON field_weather.condition_id = weather_conditions.condition_id;

SELECT field_name, moisture_level, description FROM fields JOIN moisture_data ON fields.field_id = moisture_data.field_id JOIN field_weather ON fields.field_id = field_weather.field_id JOIN weather_conditions ON field_weather.condition_id = weather_conditions.condition_id ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM field_locations;
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM field_locations WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM field_crops ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT moisture_level, measurement_date FROM soil_moisture_measurements WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT field_name, field_area, soil_type FROM field_properties WHERE field_area > 100 ORDER BY field_name;
SELECT * FROM field_locations;
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM field_locations WHERE field_id = 3;
SELECT field_id, field_name, field_area FROM field_locations JOIN field_properties ON field_locations.field_id = field_properties.field_id WHERE field_area > 1000;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM field_crops WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT field_id, moisture_level, measurement_date FROM soil_moisture_measurements WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
